title: Scrub Meadow
description: A grassy meadow punctuated by shrub and scrub. Wildflowers grow among the grasses. Lush, green grasses wave gently in the wind. The grasses range in height from less than a meter to nearly two meters tall in places. The land is gently sloped down to the north, gently sloped down to the east, gently sloped up to the south, gently sloped up to the west.
